fullDescription.intro:
The contents of the FSKX object are:
Model script: Script that calculates the values of the model (Mandatory).
Parameters script: Script with the parameter values of the model (Optional).
Visualization script: Script with a number of commands to create plots or charts using the simulation results (Optional).
Model meta data encoded using the OpenFSMR template.
Set of libraries used.
fullDescription.option: File path of the selected R model
File path of the R script with the initial values of the model parameters.
File path of the R visualization script.
File path of the XLSX spreadsheet with meta data. If unspecified or error occurs the table will be empty.
